title: Happy Birthday, Kanan-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>Happy birthday, Kanan-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Oh, thank you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>As a present, I’ll tell you your fortune. 𝅘𝅥𝅮 So, what would you like to know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Hmm...... I was thinking about challenging myself with something new this year. Is it going to go smoothly?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>A new challenge, okay. Let’s see...... The cards say...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>What do the cards say......!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Hm, I see... These are good cards. You’re very determined, and you’re going to succeed. Kanan-chan, you’ve already decided what exactly that challenge is going to be, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Oh, you saw through me? I’m going to learn how to drive and get my license.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I’m sure you’re going to get it! Your motor coordination skills are excellent.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahaha, thanks! I think I’m more worried about the actual driving skills~ But thanks to your fortune-telling, I have confidence! Once I get my license, I’ll take you out on a drive! 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
